tests package¶

Submodules¶

tests.tests module¶

Unit tests for entsoe-py¶

Use with nose2, from base directory issue:

class tests.tests.TestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

setUp()[source]¶

setUp of UnitTests for requests we need a SECRET_KEY, which we import from an environement variable. Set this variable as follows: .. code: > set ENTSOE_SECRET_KEY=my very secret api keys

tearDown()[source]¶

tearDown of UnitTests, e.g. close db, session and other structures. Here we do nothing.

test_basic_request()[source]¶

Test basic_request of the entsoe package. We make a basic_request request for one day 2018-01-27. We have in test_data the XML response and check the following:

  • check if the request got status code 200
  • check if test data could be loaded from disk
  • check how many <TimeSeries> tags were found in the present request and from the stored test data
  • find start and end time of request and compare that with o the time set in the request o the time recieved from the online request o the time recieved from the test data file
